attributes.action: Stop the Deportation of Aleksey Kirienko!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I’m writing to protest the attempted deportation of Aleksey. I ‘d like you to be aware of the unfortunate practices undertaken at the Home Office. This makes Britain seem an unjust place in the eyes of our foreign counterparts. I urge you to help bring attention to this unfortunate case.

Aleksey is a conscientious and remarkable young man. I’ve never met as charming or bright young man as him. Alexsey is the one who would rush off help someone when his own task was done or stay behind when a class was over and help me carry equipment upstairs. He makes me laugh often, has an insatiable desire to learn. I can’t speak of him highly enough!

His mother Liliya is worried for Alexsey. He has been detained in a detention centre. However, unbelievably, he is not being given his final appeal at the High Court. Liliya is a British Citizen and though Alexsey's whole family are here, he is being forcibly removed to Uzbeckistan. Unfortunately, Alexsey is not a minor so he apparently doesn't have the right to family life.

We want Alexsey to get his final High Court Appeal. 
I understand as Prime Minister you are busy but in the balance are a family, a future...

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
